author: Lynn
text: Love the clothes offered, and my order was quickly shipped, in better condition than some other consignment sites I've tried. However, a big flaw, IMO, is that they hide in the fine print whether an item is returnable or not!!  You have to scroll down below the price listing and click on Shipments and Returns. Only after clicking on the fine print do you find the information on whether an item is returnable. Even when an item is in your cart, it does not say if an item is NOT returnable. This is a little devious to me, it should be very clear, particularly once an item is in your cart, whether it is returnable, or whether you are stuck with the item if it doesn't fit or is in bad shape. After contacting customer support, I did manage at least to get store credit for the unreturnable items I wasn't aware of. So still giving them 3 stars for doing the right thing.
title: Love the clothes, but they hide returnability of items!

text:
TRR is great for buyer. You can always find a deal and there are usually promos going on. For sellers it is a TOTAL ripoff. 
I only use it to sell items that I am willing to accept a few dollars for. If you are expecting a big payout you are not going to find it by selling with TRR.
title: TRR is great for buyer, terrible for a seller

author: Saira
text:
I was very happy 2 years ago with my purchase.
This year I had worst experience.
1st of all I ordered something that I had been saving for months. I didn’t received it. I call and call and cal and call. I called for 5 days in a row to find out where is my purchase. Every day I was told to wait 24 to 48 hours. Finally, I had enough and cancel my order to find out that the item has been missing from warehouse and no one can locate it. Terrible, terrible customer service, got hung up multiple times, on hold for like 45 minutes and such. I made another purchase of similar item since it wasn’t exact what I wanted but whatever. Now these 2 items that I purchased came in tangled ( necklaces) in multiple knots. Took me 2 hours to carefully untangle them. The Real Real is not what it was 2 years ago. I would never recommend it to anyone anymore. 2 stars coz at least this time I got my order👎
title: Disappointment after disappointment
